docs.snippet: The Argentine soccer team defeated Brazil, 1-0, before a crowd of more than 50,000 at San Lorenzo de Almagro's Stadium today to gain a tie for first place in the South American soccer championships.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Argentine soccer team defeated Brazil, 1-0, before a crowd of more than 50,000 at San Lorenzo de Almagro's Stadium today to gain a tie for first place in the South American soccer championships.

headline.main: ARGENTINA SOCCER VICTOR; Tops Brazil, 1-0, Before 50,000 to Gain Tie in Titl Play

docs.snippet: More than 5,000 guests attended the fourth President's Birthday Ball given at the Waldorf-Astoria Hotel last night.

docs.snippet: The Inter-American Conference at Buenos Aires "was signally successful in adopting practical methods of preserving the peace of this hemisphere," Sumner Welles, Assistant Secretary of State, said last night at a dinner of the Peoples Mandate to...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Inter-American Conference at Buenos Aires "was signally successful in adopting practical methods of preserving the peace of this hemisphere," Sumner Welles, Assistant Secretary of State, said last night at a dinner of the Peoples Mandate to Governments to End War, at the Hotel Biltmore.

docs.snippet: Experiments leading to the establishing of an Italian airline between Rome and South America will be begun in a few weeks following negotiations just concluded by General Aldo Pellegrini, Director General of Italian Civil Aviation, in Argentina,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Experiments leading to the establishing of an Italian airline between Rome and South America will be begun in a few weeks following negotiations just concluded by General Aldo Pellegrini, Director General of Italian Civil Aviation, in Argentina, Uruguay and Brazil.
